pages.text: $(b)Barrier Rituals$() create protected zones that:$(br)- $(#4ecdc4)Push out unauthorized players$()$(br)- $(#4ecdc4)Prevent block breaking$()$(br)- $(#4ecdc4)Prevent block interaction$()$(br)- $(#4ecdc4)Extend from bedrock to build height$()$(br)- $(#4ecdc4)Can cover up to 200x200 blocks$()$(br2)Distance glyphs can be placed up to $(l)100 blocks$() from the circle in each cardinal direction.

pages.title: Allowlist Management
pages.text: $(b)Add a Player:$()$(br)1. Rename paper to their username$(br)2. Right-click the Barrier Circle$(br)3. They are granted passage$(br2)$(b)Remove a Player:$()$(br)1. Rename paper to $(l)"username"$() (with quotes)$(br)2. Right-click the Barrier Circle$(br)3. Their passage is revoked$(br2)$(#888)Unauthorized players CAN interact with the circle itself to be added.$()

pages.title: Protection Features
pages.text: $(l)Unauthorized players cannot:$()$(br)- Enter the barrier (pushed back)$(br)- Break any blocks inside$(br)- Open chests or containers$(br)- Use doors, buttons, levers$(br)- Interact with any blocks$(br2)$(l)Authorized players have:$()$(br)- Full access to everything$(br)- Ability to add/remove others$(br)- Complete build rights
